name: part_001
file: tmp_【＃一条莉々華生誕祭2025】初の生誕ライブ開幕！！一条莉々華生誕祭ライブ2025【一条莉々華⧸hololive DEV_IS　ReGLOSS】 [HB8sU0qsePE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Ichijou Ririka performs a high-energy solo song about being a 'Great Genius' and her love for her fans, featuring a playful amusement park backdrop.
Tokino Sora joins Ichijou Ririka on stage for a dynamic duet performance of 'Star Star Start'.

subtitles.original: お仕事は年中無休です
subtitles.english: My work is 24/7, year-round

subtitles.original: もう大天才 あ〜限界
subtitles.english: I'm such a genius, ah, I've hit my limit

subtitles.original: これ以上求愛されたら困ります
subtitles.english: I'll be in trouble if you court me any more

subtitles.original: だって召されちゃう
subtitles.english: Because I'll be swept off my feet

subtitles.original: だってせめてあなたがイチバンです！
subtitles.english: Because, at the very least, you are the best!

subtitles.original: 予約した推しのフィギュア
subtitles.english: The figure of my favorite I pre-ordered

subtitles.original: “来年発送予定”
subtitles.english: "Scheduled for shipping next year"

subtitles.original: そんなの慣れっこです
subtitles.english: I'm used to that kind of thing

subtitles.original: 忘れた頃に来るけど...!
subtitles.english: It'll arrive when I've forgotten about it...!

subtitles.original: 溢れる才能 無量限界周波数ですが
subtitles.english: My overflowing talent is at an infinite limit frequency

subtitles.original: リリカダマシイ増えすぎる
subtitles.english: Ririka-souls are increasing too much

subtitles.original: らびゅー
subtitles.english: Love you

subtitles.original: あ〜もう好きっ！
subtitles.english: Ah, I love you so much!

subtitles.original: 今日も大天才 大天才
subtitles.english: I'm a genius today too, a genius

subtitles.original: 死ぬ無理待っててて
subtitles.english: I'm dying, it's impossible, wait wait wait

subtitles.original: 考えられないや
subtitles.english: I can't even think

subtitles.original: 尊死
subtitles.english: Dying of wholesomeness

subtitles.original: 次の現場まで待てないや
subtitles.english: I can't wait until the next event

subtitles.original: もう大天才 あ〜限界
subtitles.english: I'm such a genius, ah, I've hit my limit

subtitles.original: 切り詰めた生活 何一つ悔いじゃない
subtitles.english: A frugal life, I don't regret a single thing

subtitles.original: だってこんなにも 幸せ溢れた日々です
subtitles.english: Because these days are just so full of happiness

subtitles.original: 来年も再来年も
subtitles.english: Next year, and the year after

subtitles.original: その先ずっと何年でも
subtitles.english: And for many years after that

subtitles.original: 推していたい 好きでいたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep supporting you, I want to keep loving you

subtitles.original: でもあなたの幸せが
subtitles.english: But your happiness is...

subtitles.original: イチバン！
subtitles.english: ...number one!

subtitles.original: 無理だけはしないでね？
subtitles.english: Just please don't push yourself too hard, okay?

subtitles.original: あなたとあなたを見つけ出した
subtitles.english: To you, and to the me who found you...

subtitles.original: 私にありがとうを
subtitles.english: ...I say thank you

subtitles.original: 今日も大天才 大天才っ！
subtitles.english: I'm a genius today too, a genius!

subtitles.original: なんでそんなに大天才？
subtitles.english: Why are you such a genius?

subtitles.original: 困るよ完璧すぎるじゃん
subtitles.english: It's troublesome, you're just too perfect

subtitles.original: もう大天才 大天才っ！
subtitles.english: I'm such a genius, a genius!

subtitles.original: 推し無し無理絶対考えたくもないなあ
subtitles.english: Life without my favorite is impossible, I don't even want to think about it

subtitles.original: 生き甲斐
subtitles.english: My reason for living

subtitles.original: お仕事は年中無休です
subtitles.english: My work is 24/7, year-round

subtitles.original: もう大天才 あ〜限界
subtitles.english: I'm such a genius, ah, I've hit my limit

subtitles.original: これ以上求愛されたら困ります
subtitles.english: I'll be in trouble if you court me any more

subtitles.original: だって召されちゃう
subtitles.english: Because I'll be swept off my feet

subtitles.original: だってせめてあなたが一番
subtitles.english: Because, at the very least, you are the best

subtitles.original: 推しに勝るものはなし
subtitles.english: There's nothing that beats a favorite

subtitles.original: 我ららの空の始まりは
subtitles.english: The beginning of our sky was...

subtitles.original: 触れた瞬間 あらららら
subtitles.english: ...the moment we touched, oh my my my

subtitles.original: ホラこれは困った 2度と元に戻らない
subtitles.english: Look, this is trouble, it'll never go back to the way it was

subtitles.original: ダイバンパッ
subtitles.english: Big Bang!

subtitles.original: そして星が生まれまして
subtitles.english: And then a star was born

subtitles.original: 明け方の一番星は
subtitles.english: The first star of the dawn is...

subtitles.original: あなたと出会った
subtitles.english: ...the moment I met you

subtitles.original: これは次元を揺るがす大発見
subtitles.english: This is a dimension-shaking discovery

subtitles.original: このままハート撃ち上げて
subtitles.english: Just like this, launch my heart up

subtitles.original: どこまでも高い空まで
subtitles.english: To the highest sky, wherever it may be

subtitles.original: めちゃ飛んじゃいたい
subtitles.english: I want to fly so high

subtitles.original: Star Star Start 来たこのラブは
subtitles.english: Star Star Start, this love that's come...

subtitles.original: あなたでなきゃイマゴロ
subtitles.english: ...if it weren't for you, by now...

subtitles.original: 超新星
subtitles.english: ...it would have gone supernova

subtitles.original: するぞ？しちゃうぞ！？
subtitles.english: Gonna do it? I'm gonna do it!?

subtitles.original: あなたに言ってますっ！
subtitles.english: I'm talking to you!

subtitles.original: 今 Star Star Start
subtitles.english: Now Star Star Start

subtitles.original: あのわかってる？
subtitles.english: Hey, do you understand?

subtitles.original: ほら目の前にずっとある
subtitles.english: Look, it's been right in front of you all along

subtitles.original: 一等星
subtitles.english: A first-magnitude star

subtitles.original: 見てる 聞いてる
subtitles.english: Looking, listening

subtitles.original: このビッグバン気づいて
subtitles.english: Notice this Big Bang

subtitles.original: あぁ地球くらいに膨らんで
subtitles.english: Ah, it's expanded to the size of the Earth

subtitles.original: こんなになってんぞ
subtitles.english: It's become like this!

subtitles.original: そそそ大騒がせは
subtitles.english: A little bit of a big disturbance is...

subtitles.original: この時のためのスター
subtitles.english: ...the star for this very moment
